Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.streams

Class StreamsUtil

java.lang.Object
chav1961.purelib.streams.StreamsUtil
public class StreamsUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This is an useful utility class to support a lot of popular operations on streams.

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

  • Method Details

    • getStreamClassForOutput

      public static java.io.Writer getStreamClassForOutput​(java.io.Writer targetWriter, MimeType from, MimeType to) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.io.IOException

      Create Writer wrapper to convert it's nested content to format required

      Parameters:
      targetWriter - writer to upload converted content to
      from - MIME type of source content
      to - MIME type of target content
      Returns:
      Writer wrapper
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - on any parameter is null
      java.io.IOException - on any I/O errors

    • copyJsonStax

      public static void copyJsonStax​(JsonStaxParser source, JsonStaxPrinter target) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.io.IOException, SyntaxException

      Copy JSON content from parser to printer

      Parameters:
      source - source StAX parser
      target - target StAX printer.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - any of parameters is null
      java.io.IOException - any I/O errors
      SyntaxException - any JSON format errors

    • copyJsonStax

      public static void copyJsonStax​(JsonStaxParser source, JsonStaxPrinter target, boolean totalCopy) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.io.IOException, SyntaxException

      Copy JSON content from parser to printer

      Parameters:
      source - source StAX parser
      target - target StAX printer.
      totalCopy - make total copy when true. Make copy from current position to the end of current element only when false.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - any of parameters is null
      java.io.IOException - any I/O errors
      SyntaxException - any JSON format errors
      Since:
      0.0.4

    • loadCreoleContent

      public static java.lang.String loadCreoleContent​(java.net.URL source, MarkupOutputFormat format) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.io.IOException

      Load Creole content into string

      Parameters:
      source - Creole content source
      format - String format to convert Creole to
      Returns:
      Creole content loaded
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameters are null
      java.io.IOException - on I/O errors durung content processing
      Since:
      0.0.4
      See Also:
      CreoleWriter
